Package org.araneaframework.http.core

Web core components, request and response abstraction implementations, dispatchers.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BaseAraneaDispatcherServlet Aranea's main servlet.
Constants Some constants and other global data that are used by the compiler and the runtime.
NonDestructiveSessionListener A session listener which does not destroy the session service and other Aranea components in the session.
StandardFileUploadInputExtension  
StandardServletInputData A ServletInputdata implementation which uses a StandardPath for determining the scope.
StandardServletOutputData A implementation of ServletOutputData, MimeOutputData and ServletOverridableOutputData using StandardPath for scoping.
StandardServletServiceAdapterComponent Creates a StandardServletInputData and StandardServletOutputData from the HttpServletRequest and HttpServletResponse respectively and routes the request to the child services using a null Path.
StandardSessionListener A session listener which takes care of destroying the session service in the session.
 

Package org.araneaframework.http.core Description

Web core components, request and response abstraction implementations, dispatchers.
